files.description: Defines the canonical ID schema (compiled regex patterns, normalization rules, and uniqueness constraints) used across extraction CSV, taxonomy JSONL, and prereg fields.
Implements robust readers/parsers for the extraction CSV, taxonomy JSONL, and prereg metadata (CSV/JSON) into a unified in-memory representation with validation-friendly field names.

Implements the ID mismatch checker that validates schema conformance, detects duplicates, and cross-checks referential integrity across extraction/taxonomy/prereg sources with actionable error reports.
Provides a runnable CLI demo that loads the included demo dataset and intentionally fails to demonstrate the checker catching ID schema and cross-file mismatch errors.
Small demo extraction CSV containing intentionally malformed and mismatching IDs to prove the checker flags schema violations and missing/extra references.
Small demo taxonomy JSONL with deliberate ID conflicts and missing IDs relative to the extraction CSV for mismatch detection.
Small demo preregistration metadata file containing prereg fields with IDs that intentionally disagree with the extraction and taxonomy sources.

missionDescription: Specify an ID schema (regex + uniqueness rules), implement an ID mismatch checker that reads the extraction CSV + taxonomy JSONL + prereg fields, and include a small demo dataset that intentionally fails to prove the checker catches the error.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Creates a cross-file identifier backbone linking extraction rows, taxonomy annotations, and preregistration fieldsâ€”preventing silent drift across artifacts and enabling consistent multilevel modeling ...
